author: bendavid
body:
Implements minimal changes for proper cross section calculation in weighted matching schemes, as well as secondary unweighting in the HadronizerFilter.

A custom version of the user hook steering the merging is added to solves some issues with processes with jets in the lowest multiplicity, plus add support for NL3 merging.  (These changes will make their way upstream eventually)
title: changes needed for ckkw, umeps, unlops and nl3 matching/merging
